rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with traditional Chettinad-style motifs and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open living space featuring large windows for ample daylight. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the main entrance towards the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with views of the garden ensuring a calm dining atmosphere. Natural light and ventilation are prioritized.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditionally styled kitchen with essential appliances. Features a utility sink area and storage designed as per Indian residential norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with private bathroom attached. Decorated in Chettinad aesthetics with natural wood finishes.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to complement the farmhouse style, ensuring privacy and ample space.

rooms.name: Study/Coffee Corner
rooms.description: A dedicated space for reading or remote work. Incorporates natural materials in keeping with Chettinad design.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A multipurpose utility area serving as laundry and storage space.

openings.details: Double door entry ensuring security while inviting natural light. Complies with Vastu principles.
Large windows placed strategically across living spaces for optimal daylight and ventilation.
Separate entrance leading to the private garden, enhancing privacy and ensuring a serene environment.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater with soundproof walls and ambient lighting. Designed for an immersive cinematic experience while adhering to space optimization.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym ensuring privacy and optimal ventilation. Features a mirrored wall and functional design elements inspired by Chettinad aesthetics.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Second Floor)
rooms.description: Expanded master bedroom on the upper level with additional space for relaxation. Incorporates an en-suite bathroom and private balcony view of the garden.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Open balcony attached to the master bedroom providing fresh air and garden views while maintaining privacy.

openings.details: A central staircase connecting ground and first floors, designed with safety features and traditional Chettinad finishes.
Well-finished railings ensuring privacy and safety while enhancing the overall aesthetic of the exterior.

garden.description: A large private garden featuring indigenous plants, water features, and open spaces to promote relaxation. Designed with traditional landscaping principles.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance oriented towards the east for prosperity.
Living areas designed in a north-south layout to ensure harmony and balance.
Private spaces are arranged to avoid direct alignment of doors or windows facing each other.

local_building_norms.fire_safety: Compliant with local building codes including fire escapes and safety measures.
local_building_norms.material_use: Use of locally sourced materials for durability and aesthetics in line with Chettinad style.
local_building_norms.environmental_impact: Energy-efficient design elements such as natural ventilation, solar shading devices, and rainwater harvesting.
